metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Blushing Mermaid - NOTE Please rename to Yeller Dawg.After Foundry destroyed, civilians come to deactivated SW.One of civilians dialogs
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-159.871567;25.131435;-84.656570&camTarget=-160.507172;24.460075;-85.037743ReCon `SetGlobalOsirisFlag GLO_Foundry_State_ControlCentreDestroyed`Wait for npc to appear and talk to this particular npc.

0.speaker: Yeller Dawg
0.text: Steel Watchers, dead and gone? I'll drink to that!

1.speaker: Yeller Dawg
1.text: Glad I came out of the Mermaid when I heard the fracas. I wouldn'a missed this for the world!
